data:
## function_callWidgetFactoryWithConfig
> **callWidgetFactoryWithConfig**\<`W`\>(`parameter`): `W` & `object`

Call a widget factory using provided configs.

### Type Parameters

• **W** *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

### Parameters

• **parameter**

the parameter

• **parameter.defaultConfig?**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the default config of the widget

• **parameter.events?**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>, keyof [`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\> & \`on$\{string\}Change\`\>\>

the events of the widget

• **parameter.factory**: [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`\>

the widget factory to call

• **parameter.props**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>

the props of the widget

• **parameter.widgetConfig?**: `null` \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the config of the widget, overriding the defaultConfig

### Returns

`W` & `object`

the widget
